title: Accountability Sinks
author: msustrik
aiHeadline: Accountability takes a dive as everyone suddenly discovers they're 'too busy' to follow through on their promises, proving that 'adulting' is just a myth.

title: Show HN: Free, in-browser PDF editor
author: philjohnson
aiHeadline: Introducing the world's most overpriced free PDF editor, because who needs features when you can have a browser crash? (Hint: nobody)

title: Minimum Viable Blog
author: jlundberg
aiHeadline: The 'minimum viable blog' is here to remind us that sometimes, less is just less, and 'simple' can also mean 'boring as heck'.

title: Buffett to step down following six-decade run atop Berkshire
author: mfiguiere
aiHeadline: Warren Buffett finally hangs up his spurs after 60 years, proving that even the best investors eventually realize they're just really good at waiting for the market to do its thing.

title: We fell out of love with Next.js and back in love with Ruby on Rails
author: mike1o1
aiHeadline: After a rocky relationship with Next.js, this team decided that sometimes, going back to the 'old reliable' (Ruby on Rails) is like reuniting with an ex who still knows how to make you laughâ€”and not just at their outdated jokes.
